rows.label: tlk42400013_06_msg0001
rows.name:
Due to the collapse of Acedia,
everyone everywhere is extremely busy, mo.

rows.label: tlk42400013_06_msg0002
rows.name:
We're dispatching help from Avaritia
to assist with accepting refugees.

rows.label: tlk42400013_06_msg0003
rows.name: We're also arranging for the necessary supplies, mo.

rows.label: tlk42400013_06_msg0004
rows.name: Helping each other is important in this world, mo.

rows.label: tlk42400013_06_msg0005
rows.name:
If you see someone in trouble,
be proactive in helping them, mo.
